segregationKeys: Chargebacks -> Write Off Invoice + Cancel Subscription
Invoice 30 Days Past Due, Account Summary

workflow_definition.name: Chargebacks -> Write Off Invoice + Cancel Subscription

workflow.name: Chargebacks -> Write Off Invoice + Cancel Subscription
workflow.description: This workflow would run on a schedule and pick up invoices with a balance that have a tied chargeback refund. Those invoices are written off using InvoiceItemAdjustments and the linked Subscriptions are then cancelled.

tasks.name: Pull Refunds from Chargebacks where Invoice Balance > 0

Amendment.Name: Chargeback Cancellation
Amendment.EffectiveDate: {% if Data.Workflow.ExecutionDate > Data.Subscription.SubscriptionEndDate %}{{ Data.Subscription.SubscriptionEndDate }}{% else %}{{ Data.Workflow.ExecutionDate }}{% endif %}

parameters.where_clause: Id = '{{ Data.InvoiceItem | map: "SubscriptionId" | join: "' OR Id = '"}}' AND Status = 'Active'

workflow_definition.name: Invoice 30 Days Past Due, Account Summary

workflow.name: Invoice 30 Days Past Due, Account Summary

email.name: Workflow Template
email.subject: Action Required {{Data.Account.Name}} Invoice 30 Days Past Due

parameters.where_clause: DueDate <= '{{Data.Invoice.DueDate}}' AND Balance > 0 AND Status = 'Posted' AND AccountId = '{{Data.Account.Id}}'
Invoice.DueDate <= 'today - 30 days' AND Invoice.Balance > 0 AND Invoice.Status = 'Posted' Order By Invoice.DueDate Desc
